00027 int ResponseCallbackCreateScanner::response(short moreflag, int32_t id, StaticBuffer &ext) {
00028   m_header_builder.initialize_from_request(m_event_ptr->header);
00029   CommBufPtr cbp(new CommBuf(m_header_builder, 10, ext));
00030   cbp->append_i32(Error::OK);
00031   cbp->append_i16(moreflag);
00032   cbp->append_i32(id);   // scanner ID
00033   return m_comm->send_response(m_event_ptr->addr, cbp);
